title: Sampler, 1759
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation 
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Sarah Plommer her work in the ninth year of her age 1759
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased Rockafeller sale 1962 Anderson Gallery Cat. #1303.
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Urn of flowers in the center, a flowering vine border, male and female figures in corners, cupids and birds.

tombstone.epitaph:

1759. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
